remarks: The range of such an evaluation map is the finite linear combinations of the target vectors and also the span of the target vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Feb-2015.)
statement:
frlmup.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmup.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmup.c $e |- C = ( Base ` T ) $.
frlmup.v $e |- .x. = ( .s ` T ) $.
frlmup.e $e |- E = ( x e. B |-> ( T gsum ( x oF .x. A ) ) ) $.
frlmup.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. LMod ) $.
frlmup.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. X ) $.
frlmup.r $e |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` T ) ) $.
frlmup.a $e |- ( ph -> A : I --> C ) $.
frlmup.k $e |- K = ( LSpan ` T ) $.
frlmup3 $p |- ( ph -> ran E = ( K ` ran A ) ) $.
$d .x. x $.
$d A x $.
